name: generate_documentation
description: Generates comprehensive documentation for the provided code structure.

summary.description: A brief summary of the code structure, highlighting its purpose and functionality.

changes_made.description: A detailed list of changes made to the codebase during the documentation insertion process.

code_snippet.description: The specific snippet of code (function, class, or method) that has been documented.

documentation_format.description: The format in which the documentation should be inserted into the code. Options are 'docstring' for Python docstrings or 'comment' for inline comments in other languages.

language.description: The programming language of the code snippet to ensure appropriate documentation syntax.

style_guidelines.description: Specific style guidelines to follow when generating documentation, such as adhering to PEP 8 for Python or Airbnb style guide for JavaScript.

project_info.description: Additional information about the project to provide context for the documentation generation.

args.description: List of arguments for the function.

docstring.description: The docstring or description of the function.

async.description: Indicates whether the function is asynchronous.

functions.description: List of functions defined in the file with their details.

args.description: List of arguments for the method.

docstring.description: The docstring or description of the method.

async.description: Indicates whether the method is asynchronous.

type.description: The type of the method (e.g., constructor, getter, setter).

methods.description: List of methods defined in the class with their details.

docstring.description: The docstring or description of the class.

classes.description: List of classes defined in the file with their details.
